mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO,MESSAGE_CONTENT,MESSAGE_READER,MESSAGE_SENDER,MESSAGE_SENDDATE,MESSAGE_STATE FROM(SELECT MESSAGE_NO,MESSAGE_CONTENT,MESSAGE_READER,MESSAGE_SENDER,MESSAGE_SENDDATE,MESSAGE_STATE, RN FROM(SELECT MESSAGE_NO,MESSAGE_CONTENT,MESSAGE_READER,MESSAGE_SENDER,MESSAGE_SENDDATE,MESSAGE_STATE, ROWNUM AS RN FROM (SELECT MESSAGE_NO,MESSAGE_CONTENT,MESSAGE_READER,MESSAGE_SENDER,MESSAGE_SENDDATE,MESSAGE_STATE FROM PF_MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_READER = #{user_id} ORDER BY MESSAGE_NO DESC))WHERE RN <= #{page} * 10) WHERE RN >=(#{page} -1) * 10 +1
SELECT count(*) FROM PF_MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_READER=#{user_id}
